description: Authorities are investigating "irregularities" in the Barcelona striker's citizenship test.
title: Luis Suarez: Police probe his Italian citizenship test
title_page: Luis Suarez: Police probe his Italian citizenship test - BBC News
maintext: The player allegedly knew about subjects given in the test before he took it at the University fore Foreigners of Perugia and had his final score agreed beforehand, according to a statement issued by the prosecutor's office in Perugia, central Italy, and the Guardia di Finanza.
